about_the_game:
Step into the untamed wilderness with "Wild Lynx Jigsaw"—a captivating puzzle game that lets you piece together the beauty and mystery of the majestic lynx. From 30-piece relaxing puzzles to intricate 285-piece challenges, immerse yourself in stunning scenes of the lynx roaming its natural habitat.

Experience the elegance of this elusive feline as you assemble vivid images of snow-covered forests, sunlit meadows, and tranquil mountain landscapes. Whether you're a casual puzzler or a seasoned pro, every puzzle piece brings you closer to the enchanting world of the lynx.

Highlights of Your Wilderness Journey:

  • Discover the Lynx: Explore puzzles featuring the lynx in its wild environment, showcasing its grace, power, and allure.

  • Journey Through Nature: Unlock breathtaking scenes of dense forests, icy tundras, and serene glades teeming with life.

  • Tailor Your Challenge: Choose your puzzle size, from quick 30-piece creations to 285-piece masterpieces for a rewarding challenge.

  • Collect and Learn: Solve puzzles to reveal interesting facts about the lynx and unlock unique wildlife-themed surprises.

"Wild Lynx Jigsaw" is more than just a game—it’s an adventure into the heart of the wilderness, where every piece tells a story of nature’s beauty. With stunning artwork, adjustable difficulty, and an immersive atmosphere, it’s perfect for puzzle enthusiasts and wildlife lovers alike. Begin your journey today and uncover the magic of the wild, one piece at a time!

name: Wild Lynx Jigsaw

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 385 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
